CustomField.formula: IF (NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(FSM_PriorityUpdateByScheduler__c))), VALUE(TEXT(FSM_PriorityUpdateByScheduler__c)), IF ((NOT(ISBLANK( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__c)) && ( TEXT( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_NoticeState__c) == 'NSEN')), 1, (100 - if(FSM_CustomerAppointment__c,FSM_CustomerAppointmentScore__c,FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_NoticeTypeScore__c) - FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_NoticeStatusScore__c - FSM_DueDateScore__c - FSM_DurationScore__c - FSM_ConstraintStartScore__c - FSM_PriorityScore__c - FSM_TypeOfLeakScore__c - FSM_BacklogScore__c ) ))
CustomField.label: Dynamic Priority
